name: March 15 1924
description:
March 15, 1924 is a lovecraftian 7drl made in March of 2014 and is a game based loosely around the Call of Cthulhu mythos and Horror Role Playing Game. You are an investigator, hired by a family of the recently disappeared Wilmer Sipes to find information about him. You get a lead about an abandoned warehouse he was spotted entering. What eldritch horrors you find below, are up to you to discover.

This is essentially an archive of an old 7drl  project that has been available on my website for download for 6 years before this upload, so its old, old but I think its worth playing.

This does not share a universe with my other projects, it is completely unrelated in all but theming.

You can support my newer projects and get special perks in the process by supporting me on patreon!

Become a Patron!

Also heres the original place where this could be downloaded:

https://untrustedlife.com/downloads/
